elements.name: question1
elements.title: Why has the mail order business been able to increase its market share in recent years? List four different reasons.
elements.correctAnswer: Changing shopping habits of the population, time factor when shopping, aggressive advertising by mail-order companies, favoring of mail-order business through technical progress (Internet), shopping from home with the family

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Marta Garic and Fabio Gianini would like to sell T-shirts they have created themselves. They cannot yet agree on the form of distribution. The two options under discussion are an online store (Internet trade) or a specialty store (retail trade).

elements.name: question2
elements.title: a) Help Marta and Fabio choose the form of distribution. Name two different advantages and disadvantages of each option. Online store:
elements.correctAnswer: Advantages: Customers can order conveniently from anywhere; customers can shop 24 hours a day in the online store, etc. / Disadvantages: no personal customer contact, returns, etc.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Specialty store:
elements.correctAnswer: Advantages: T-shirts can be tried on and touched; customers can be advised, etc. / Disadvantages: Expensive store rent; smaller customer base, etc.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: b) Which of the two options would you recommend to Marta and Fabio? Give reasons for your answer.
